    <script type='text/javascript'>
    //<![CDATA[
    (function() {
        // MOCK DATA
        let currentUser = { name: "Nguyễn Văn A", wallet: 5000000 };
        let orders = [
            { id: "DH-256", service: "Tăng 1000 Follow Facebook", date: "12/02/2026", status: "bidding", price: 0, icon: "fa-brands fa-facebook", bids: [
                { id: "BID01", advertiser: "Agency Pro VN", price: 500000, rate: 4.9 },
                { id: "BID02", advertiser: "Tùng Ads Thủ", price: 450000, rate: 4.5 }
            ]},
            { id: "DH-255", service: "Thuê VPS iNET 1 Tháng", date: "10/02/2026", status: "processing", price: 250000, icon: "fa-solid fa-server", partner: "iNET Support" },
            { id: "DH-254", service: "Code Tool Auto Reg", date: "09/02/2026", status: "pending", price: 0, icon: "fa-solid fa-code", bids: [] },
            { id: "DH-253", service: "Mua Proxy IPv4", date: "01/02/2026", status: "completed", price: 150000, icon: "fa-solid fa-globe", partner: "IPFoxy" }
        ];

        // INIT
        setTimeout(() => {
            document.getElementById('user-name').textContent = currentUser.name;
            document.getElementById('user-avatar').textContent = currentUser.name.charAt(0);
            document.getElementById('user-wallet').textContent = new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }).format(currentUser.wallet);
            
            document.getElementById('auth-overlay').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('app-root').classList.remove('hidden');
            renderOrders(orders);
        }, 1000);

        // UI HELPERS
        window.toggleMobileMenu = () => {
            const sb = document.getElementById('sidebar-menu');
            sb.classList.toggle('hidden');
            sb.classList.toggle('flex');
            sb.classList.toggle('fixed');
            sb.classList.toggle('inset-0');
            sb.classList.toggle('bg-white');
            sb.classList.toggle('z-50');
        }

        window.switchTab = (tab, btn) => {
            // Update Active State Sidebar
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item').forEach(el => {
                el.classList.remove('bg-blue-50', 'text-blue-700');
                el.classList.add('text-gray-600', 'hover:bg-gray-50');
            });
            btn.classList.remove('text-gray-600', 'hover:bg-gray-50');
            btn.classList.add('bg-blue-50', 'text-blue-700');
            
            // Filter logic
            if(tab === 'history') filterOrders('completed');
            else filterOrders(tab);
        }

        window.filterOrders = (status, btn) => {
            if(btn) {
                document.querySelectorAll('.filter-tab').forEach(el => {
                    el.classList.remove('active', 'bg-white', 'text-gray-800', 'shadow-sm');
                    el.classList.add('text-gray-500');
                });
                btn.classList.add('active', 'bg-white', 'text-gray-800', 'shadow-sm');
                btn.classList.remove('text-gray-500');
            }
            
            if(status === 'all') renderOrders(orders);
            else renderOrders(orders.filter(o => o.status === status));
        }

        // RENDER LOGIC
        window.renderOrders = (data) => {
            const mount = document.getElementById('order-mount-point');
            mount.innerHTML = '';
            
            if(data.length === 0) {
                mount.innerHTML = '<div class="col-span-full text-center py-12 text-gray-400 bg-gray-50 rounded-xl border border-dashed border-gray-200">No orders found.</div>';
                return;
            }

            data.forEach(order => {
                let statusBadge = '', btnHtml = '';
                
                // Status Logic with Tailwind Colors
                if (order.status === 'bidding') {
                    statusBadge = '<span class="bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 text-xs px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full font-bold">Bidding</span>';
                    btnHtml = `<button onclick="openBidModal('${order.id}')" class="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white text-sm font-semibold py-2 rounded-lg transition shadow-sm">View ${order.bids.length} Bids</button>`;
                } else if (order.status === 'processing') {
                    statusBadge = '<span class="bg-green-100 text-green-700 text-xs px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full font-bold">Running</span>';
                    btnHtml = `<button onclick="openChat('${order.id}', '${order.partner}')" class="w-full bg-white border border-gray-300 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 text-sm font-semibold py-2 rounded-lg transition flex items-center justify-center gap-2"><i class="fa-regular fa-comments"></i> Chat</button>`;
                } else if (order.status === 'completed') {
                    statusBadge = '<span class="bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 text-xs px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full font-bold">Done</span>';
                    btnHtml = `<button class="w-full bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 text-sm font-semibold py-2 rounded-lg cursor-not-allowed">Completed</button>`;
                } else {
                    statusBadge = '<span class="bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-700 text-xs px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full font-bold">Pending</span>';
                    btnHtml = `<button class="w-full bg-gray-50 text-gray-400 text-sm font-semibold py-2 rounded-lg cursor-not-allowed">Waiting...</button>`;
                }

                let price = order.price > 0 ? new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }).format(order.price) : '<span class="text-gray-400 text-sm font-normal">--</span>';

                mount.innerHTML += `
                <div class="bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-200 p-5 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition duration-200 group">
                    <div class="flex justify-between items-start mb-4">
                        <div class="flex gap-4">
                            <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-xl bg-gray-50 border border-gray-100 flex items-center justify-center text-xl text-gray-600 group-hover:text-blue-600 group-hover:border-blue-100 transition">
                                <i class="${order.icon}"></i>
                            </div>
                            <div>
                                <h4 class="font-bold text-gray-900 line-clamp-1">${order.service}</h4>
                                <div class="flex items-center gap-3 mt-1 text-xs text-gray-500">
                                    <span>#${order.id}</span>
                                    <span>•</span>
                                    <span>${order.date}</span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        ${statusBadge}
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="flex items-end justify-between border-t border-gray-50 pt-4 mt-2">
                        <div>
                            <p class="text-[10px] uppercase text-gray-400 font-bold tracking-wider">Price</p>
                            <p class="text-lg font-bold text-gray-800">${price}</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="w-32">
                            ${btnHtml}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>`;
            });
        }

        // MODAL LOGIC
        window.closeModal = (id) => document.getElementById(id).classList.add('hidden');
        
        window.openBidModal = (id) => {
            const order = orders.find(o => o.id === id);
            document.getElementById('modal-order-id').innerText = id;
            const list = document.getElementById('bid-list-mount');
            list.innerHTML = '';
            
            order.bids.forEach(bid => {
                list.innerHTML += `
                <div class="border border-gray-200 rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center justify-between hover:border-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-50 transition cursor-pointer group">
                    <div class="flex items-center gap-3">
                        <div class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-gray-200 flex items-center justify-center text-gray-500 group-hover:bg-white group-hover:text-blue-600"><i class="fa-solid fa-user-tie"></i></div>
                        <div>
                            <h5 class="font-bold text-gray-800 text-sm">${bid.advertiser}</h5>
                            <div class="flex items-center gap-1 text-xs text-yellow-500">
                                <i class="fa-solid fa-star"></i> <span class="font-bold text-gray-600">${bid.rate}</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="text-right">
                        <p class="text-lg font-bold text-red-600">${new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN').format(bid.price)} đ</p>
                        <button onclick="alert('Accepted!')" class="mt-1 text-xs bg-gray-900 text-white px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md font-bold hover:bg-black transition">Accept</button>
                    </div>
                </div>`;
            });
            document.getElementById('bid-modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        }

        // CHAT LOGIC
        window.openChat = (id, partner) => {
            document.getElementById('chat-partner-name').innerText = partner;
            const area = document.getElementById('chat-messages-area');
            area.innerHTML = `
                <div class="flex justify-start"><div class="bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-none text-sm shadow-sm max-w-[80%]">Hi there, order #${id} is in progress.</div></div>
                <div class="flex justify-end"><div class="bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-2xl rounded-tr-none text-sm shadow-sm max-w-[80%]">Thanks! How long will it take?</div></div>
            `;
            document.getElementById('chat-modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        }

        window.sendMessage = () => {
            const inp = document.getElementById('msg-input');
            if(!inp.value) return;
            const area = document.getElementById('chat-messages-area');
            area.innerHTML += `<div class="flex justify-end"><div class="bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-2xl rounded-tr-none text-sm shadow-sm max-w-[80%] animate-fadeIn">${inp.value}</div></div>`;
            inp.value = '';
            area.scrollTop = area.scrollHeight;
        }

    })();
    //]]>
    </script>
</b:if>
  </b:includable>
  </b:widget>
</b:section>
